mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: DivulgaIF is an open-source community platform, developed by the academic community for the academic community. Our goal is to democratize access to knowledge produced at the Federal Institute of Paraná, allowing everyone to discover, share, and be inspired by academic works freely.

values.transparencyDesc: Free and open access to the knowledge produced.
values.collaborationDesc: We foster the exchange of ideas and experiences.
values.innovationDesc: We encourage creativity and critical thinking.

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Create your account using your institutional email or SUAP.

step2.title: Publish
step2.description: Add your academic works with description and tags.

step3.title: Share
step3.description: Your work will be visible to the entire IFPR community.

community.title: A Platform Made by the Community, for the Community
community.intro: DivulgaIF is an open-source project developed by IFPR students and professors. Our mission is to create a space where everyone can discover and share knowledge openly and accessibly.

openAccess.title: Open Access
openAccess.description: All published works are freely available for consultation, promoting free access to scientific and academic knowledge.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Our platform is open source, allowing the community to contribute with improvements and adaptations to better meet academic needs.

collaborative.title: Collaborative
collaborative.description: Built by IFPR's academic community, DivulgaIF is the result of joint work by students, professors, and researchers.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: IFPR students, professors, and researchers can use the platform.
faq.question2: Do I need to pay to publish?
faq.answer2: No! DivulgaIF is completely free for the entire academic community.
faq.question3: How do I publish my work?
faq.answer3: Just log in, click 'New Work' and fill in the requested information.
faq.question4: Can I edit my work after publishing?
faq.answer4: Yes, you can edit or remove your works at any time.

ifpr.title: An IFPR Project
ifpr.description: DivulgaIF was born at the Federal Institute of Paraná as a student initiative to revolutionize how we share and discover academic knowledge. Developed by students and guided by professors, this project represents IFPR's commitment to innovation and open access to education.

feature1.title: Academic Project
feature1.description: Developed as an extension and research project by IFPR students.

feature2.title: Open Source
feature2.description: Fully open code available for the community to contribute.

feature3.title: Constantly Evolving
feature3.description: Always improving with feedback from the academic community.
